label: Hit accession
tooltip: Accession number of best homology match recovered from megablast search of contigs against the core nucleotide database

label: Taxon name
tooltip: Taxonomic description of the best homology match

label: Reads
tooltip: Number of quality filtered reads that mapped to the reference sequence

label: % Reads
tooltip: Percentage of quality filtered reads that mapped to the reference sequence

label: Mean depth
tooltip: Average depth of coverage across the reference sequence

label: % Coverage at 30X
tooltip: Percentage of the reference sequence that is covered by at least 30 reads

label: Mean mapping quality
tooltip: Average mapping quality of the reads that mapped to the reference sequence

label: Normalised confidence score
tooltip: The normalised confidence score is a value between 0 and 1 that is calculated by normalising the confidence score to the maximum possible score for this sequence. A value of 1 indicates the sequence with highest confidence
